name: High Speed Bike Racer
description:
High Speed Bike Racer game is an extreme tricky stunt bike racing game on furious asphalt speed road of traffic highway. In High Speed Bike Racer with road rash tricky stunt and become original master king of highway dirt trail bike racer. This entertaining High Speed Bike Racer game have many different tracks to perform endless stunts. In king endless stunt bike racing, you have trial frontier with motto heavy bike traffic racing. The heavy bikes have physics based power engine to do trail bike racing challenge and beat highway racer. Dangerous stunt game has different and difficult moto bike action to win biker championship 2018.

High Speed Bike Racer game is the amazing racing game in adventure and simulation. Drive your motto heavy bike freely on the highway rush tracks. High Speed Bike Racer has high resolution graphics and realistic sound of superbike race. High Speed Bike Racer game freely available on app store.

High Speed Bike Racer: Features

HD Graphics.
Realistic sound motor bike.
Smooth control of High Speed Bike Racer.
Different camera views.
Realistic experience of racing and drifting.
Interesting endless traffic rush game.
